text.quote: 1: Clause 1, page 1, line 18, leave out “simple”
2: Clause 1, page 2, line 15, leave out from “rate” to end of line 27 and insert “shall be equal to the annual rate of inflation as measured by the consumer price index.
(4) After subsection (4) insert—”
3: Schedule 1, page 6, leave out lines 26 to 32 and insert—
“4 The Lord Chancellor—
text.IndentOne: (a) may make an order under paragraph 3(1) consequent upon an annual review, the first of which must be conducted no later than 12 months from the coming into force of this Schedule, with subsequent reviews to be conducted no later than 12 months after the most recent review;

(b) must make an order under paragraph 3(1) whenever the value of the consumer price index has exceeded, by more than 15 percent, its value either at the time when this Schedule comes into force or at the time of the most recent order, whichever is the later date.”

text.quote: 4: Clause 4, page 3, line 26, leave out “(other than a contingent interest in remainder)”

5: Schedule 2, page 8, line 13, leave out from “subsection” to end of line 38 and insert “(1)(d), for the words from “who” to the end substitute “who in relation to any marriage or civil partnership to which the deceased was at any time a party, or otherwise in relation to any family in which the deceased at any time stood in the role of a parent, was treated by the deceased as a child of the family;””
6: Schedule 2, page 8, line 40, leave out “(1ZA)(e)” and insert “(1)(d)”
7: Schedule 2, page 9, line 1, leave out paragraph 3
8: Schedule 2, page 9, line 19, leave out “(1ZA)(f)” and insert “(1)(e)”
9: Clause 9, page 4, line 31, at end insert—
“(6) After paragraph (c) of that proviso, insert—

“Trustees may, in their absolute discretion, resolve at or before the time of exercising the power conferred by this subsection that the money or property so paid, transferred or applied, instead of being treated for the purposes of provisos (a) and (b) as having the value which it had at the date of payment, transfer or application, shall be treated as a percentage of the presumptive share of the beneficiary to whom it is paid, transferred or applied and be brought into account accordingly.””
10: Clause 9, page 4, line 31, at end insert—
“(6) After paragraph (c) of that proviso, insert—

“The trustees in exercising the power conferred by this subsection must ensure that the money or property so paid be treated as a percentage of the presumptive share of the beneficiary to whom it is paid, transferred or applied and be brought into account accordingly.””
11*: Clause 9, page 4, line 31, at end insert—
“(6) After subsection (1), insert—

“(1A) In exercise of the foregoing power trustees may pay, transfer or apply money or other property on the basis (express or implied) that it shall be treated as a proportionate part of the capital out of which it was paid, transferred or applied, for the purpose of bringing it into account in accordance with proviso (b) to subsection (1) of this section.””
12: Schedule 4, page 14, line 26, leave out paragraphs 5 and 6
